content.text: The book chronicles insights from 20 outstanding Singapore business leaders across different industries, and highlights their unique journeys in leadership, business resilience, innovation and transformation, and partnerships for growth.

content.title: 20 Conversations Publication
content.content: <iframe style="width:700px;height:400px;" src="https://online.fliphtml5.com/dvqz/fxkc/" seamless="seamless" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

summary: In celebration of Singapore Business Federation (SBF)â€™s 20th anniversary, the Future Economy Council (FEC) collaborated with SBF to launch the 20 Conversations, a publication to help instil confidence, inspire transformation, and incite the pursuit of new opportunities as businesses forge ahead with renewed vigour.
